description: LearnerAI service data sync for RAG: courses (learning paths) from Supabase 'courses' table, returned via GRPC Process (realtime + batch).

field_descriptions.competency_target_name: Primary key / course identifier (also used as learning path id).
field_descriptions.user_id: Learner UUID that owns this course.
field_descriptions.learning_path: Prompt-3 structured JSON (path_title, learner_id, total_estimated_duration_hours, learning_modules).
field_descriptions.approved: Whether the learning path is approved.
field_descriptions.created_at: When the course record was created.
field_descriptions.last_modified_at: When the course record was last modified.

learning_modules.module_description: Understand pointer basics, dereferencing, and memory safety.
skills_covered: Passing by Value vs Passing by Reference

notes: GRPC realtime mode returns data as a direct array of course records (no wrappers).
GRPC batch mode returns data as {"items": [...], "page": n, "limit": n, "total": n} (no extra wrapper keys).
This service currently syncs from Supabase table 'courses'.
